portfolio.title: This Website
portfolio.description:
This website doubles up as a place for me to show off projects while at the same time allowing me to try out new technology. 
 When making this page I decided to try some new things that I wasnt familiar with.
portfolio.body:
When building this site I wanted to try something new that I had zero experience with. 
 I decided to go with Nextjs and bootstrap 
Nextjs is being a React framework and Bootstrap being a CSS framework

portfolio.title: shelterAdoptionpet
portfolio.body:
We had to come up with an idea for an 8 hour hackathon that contained frontend, backend and either a database or used an api.
The idea was simple: Make it easier to adopt animals from shelters by combining animal adoption with a dating app.
